alert.note: Alert for Oahu in Honolulu (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 25 at 3:40AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM HST THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Oahu in Honolulu County. * WHEN...Until 645 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 339 AM HST, radar indicated heavy rain over windward and mountain areas on Oahu. Rain was falling at a rate of 0.5 to 1 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Punaluu, Waikane, Kaaawa, Waiahole, Hauula, Kahaluu, Wahiawa, Laie, Mililani, Ahuimanu, Pearl City, Aiea, Kahuku, Halawa, Kaneohe, Moanalua, Kaneohe Marine Base, Kailua, Kahana Valley State Park and Kualoa. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 645 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
